## Introduction

A dashboard by [Ivan d'Ortenzio](https://github.com/ivandorte) showing incoming and outgoing commuting flows between Italian regions.

## App

This app runs entirely in the browser via [Pyodide](https://pyodide.org) and [panel convert](https://panel.holoviz.org/how_to/wasm/convert.html).
